transArray.content: The breakfast is a combination of Chinese and Western. Generally, there is everything you want. As long as you are not very picky, you can basically meet the requirements. The location of the hotel is very good, only about 100 meters away from the subway entrance, and it is quite convenient to travel. It is located in Qianmen Pedestrian Street and Dashilan Commercial District, so it is very convenient for eating and entertainment. It is only a few hundred meters away from the front door, and you can walk to Tiananmen Square.
